mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM `t_funtime_game_show_conf` where type = #{type} and flag = 1 and game_code = #{gameCode} and DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')+0 BETWEEN day_start AND day_end and if(hour_start>hour_end,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i')+0>hour_start or hour_end>DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i')+0,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%H%i')+0 BETWEEN hour_start AND hour_end)
SELECT is_date FROM `t_funtime_game` where game_code = #{gameCode} and #{myLevel}>=need_level and is_show = 1 limit 1

select game_code as gameCode,name,icon,is_date as isDate,redirect_type as type,resource_url as url,landscape from t_funtime_game where location = #{location} and is_show = 1 and #{myLevel}>=need_level order by sort asc
select number1,number2,number3,draw_type as drawType,draw_val as drawVal ,probability,broadcast from t_funtime_game_yaoyao_conf where pool_id = #{id}
select id,quota,actual_pool as actualPool from t_funtime_game_yaoyao_pool where type = #{type}
select type,quota,init_pool as initPool,actual_pool as actualPool from t_funtime_game_yaoyao_pool where id = #{id}
select id,draw_number as drawNumber,draw_url as drawUrl,type,draw_type as drawType,draw_id as drawId,draw_val as drawVal,probability,broadcast from t_funtime_game_smash_egg_conf where type = #{type}
select id,draw_number as drawNumber,draw_url as drawUrl,draw_type as drawType,draw_id as drawId,draw_val as drawVal,probability,broadcast from t_funtime_game_circle_conf
mapper.insert: insert into t_funtime_game_yaoyao_pool_history (pool_id,type, quota, init_pool, actual_pool,sys_expend,counts) select t.id,t.type,t.quota, t.init_pool, t.actual_pool ,ROUND(sum(d.basic_amount*((100-d.pool_percent)/100))) sys_expend ,count(d.id) counts from t_funtime_game_yaoyao_pool t left join t_funtime_user_account_yaoyao_record d on d.basic_amount = t.quota where d.create_time BETWEEN #{startDate} and #{endDate} GROUP BY t.id order by t.id

insert into t_funtime_user_account_yaoyao_record (user_id, type, draw_random, draw_info, draw_amount,basic_amount,user_amont,pool_amount, pool_percent,user_exchange_amount) values (#{userId}, #{type}, #{drawRandom}, #{drawInfo}, #{drawAmount}, #{basicAmount},#{userAmont},#{poolAmount},#{poolPercent},#{userExchangeAmount})
